feed.title: Lidarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.8.2.4493
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • ad084cdf917d1f84d967be01b09891fe5d19653b Fixed: Parse FLAC 24-bit/24_bit/24.bit as FLAC 24bit
  • 4bcdc49777c21808389dcf70127a4ccb7b5dd008 Fixed: Refresh backup list on deletion
  • 502cb2089843d2149f506cdc8fd33162d8343776 Fixed: Error getting processes in some cases
  • 0fd6c263b1316b89dec59673328451db78bd80ff Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 11af8a5e05fd8b3c6e62e243e1978112949880ac Bump version to 2.8.2
  • 88196340a8f898838212d12b72624ffe47e8403e Automated API Docs update
  • 4048f2bd72cad9fede454bf695e23d981b45a809 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 1f76f6cb192c913b333f41339059140e1099c118 Fixed: Trimming disabled logs database
  • cc409d50f5a6994f662fdddf929481506128c63e New: Config file setting to disable log database
  • 14716a140560af4ee2be89a3d74623776ba0c593 New: Support for new SABnzbd history retention values
See More * f3a697ca6868242c9a8be7c54e109ac17ad7960e Deluge communication improvements * f87a8fa9f5e084e1b19f88dd2d9e7b8715c5ea45 New: Add config file setting for CGNAT authentication bypass * b298bfd9321875c29b9b7b020ad32b26879eb624 Fix tags help message * ecb7d9f6a6165745ae355398c7e7e5dc7d9066b0 Fix adding delay profile error message * eef55f65c6dfe75f62c75b9746f4676d58c13b2b Remove unnecessary heap allocations in local IP check * beabad5e3a07155641c55637314be0154400ab86 Fixed: Updated Base Url for Redacted (#5250) * 2b1684a793b37dfc741b4b61e781de6166bf84d6 Webpack web target * f23d75d031042d3c4a7215483022b4efdd9c4376 Fixed: Normalize unicode characters when comparing paths for equality * abe0090f94380a3dcda39077ebf65f968d6a6fd8 Fixed: Allow files to be moved from Torrent Blackhole even when remove is disabled * 8d32a532e4aa01526cd521c3b88d62d5cc477916 Pin ReportGenerator in Azure Pipelines for .NET 6 * a3b78aacdc8a33ff643fe9a6cb9a6a1656d12810 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * c43a141b659bb27a2d7385c106a68984042384fc Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * d2f5feab5dfc8c37823933ff2a956640bc9200da Automated API Docs update * cfb517a90fc56e6c060558675867c09ea32dc6b8 Fixed: Filtering queue by multiple qualities [ #5223 ] * 3f81e0254f6ac7565f131f149ac2d0442e111b1f Fixed: Loading queue with pending releases for deleted artists [ #5214 ] * 29d17c634770cd79aba33a8337091df3919fb4e6 Fixed: Root folder existence for import lists health check [ #5218 ] * 23f7dc3d3c591ab0881cf69e25676b9ac62774be Show an artist path as example in Mount Health Check [ #5225 ] * e39e990696054fb9cd3b88361741b2d52b2da5b2 New: Use instance name in PWA manifest [ #5203 ] * 0c2ede48e87b32afff687a724d2220f2476a5a1c Fixed: PWA Manifest with URL base [ #5203, #5030 ] * ca23ac301126e50e2f94e95a86a5a79eed076874 Rename Manage Custom Formats to Manage Formats [ #5207 ] * e50e79167acfb5a8fc4a76a1ca95285616142eeb Fixed: Cleaning the French preposition 'Ã ' from names [ #5213 ] * fd3f493eb6324c9fb2832afe3ee764328320155b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * f6d3481e38f608afe02e637183c7222407464c77 New: Add individual edit to Manage Custom Formats * e04c28fe2d46a9616712bd3f8c7035002896e249 Use current time for cache break in development * 030300c896dbfcf85b4197b4536dd953d8fa131c Bump version to 2.8.1 * 50872f3629df8c98d23bd859b7fd1a734ccc94de Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 3232e9ab94ebe8b07e21d3340aaf99350506b983 Fixed: Initial state for qBittorrent v5.0 [ #5187 ] * 8623b4410c0b57ef43ab38aac2757760522e3beb Inherit trigger from pushed command models [ #5181 ] * a843a46fbec061900ed7da85531564fef8a3528a Improve message for grab errors due to no matching tags [ #5182 ] * 54a758a1b86658cee045f374017d7a2d9689a126 Use `OperatingSystem` class to get OS information * ca5379f817f816354498b00a930d574a565e2f2c Fixed: Natural sorting for tags list in the UI * 96b51a02e2f72587b9520ff2981837fece1b8683 Fixed: Status check for completed directories in Deluge * f7acd57f73d5f4bc1637363a1f01f018e01d259b Cleanse exceptions in event logs * 20eb61dbc6864a656f78e265605d1ee4fb00e16c Bump version to 2.8.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Lidarr/43582661-9ac3-4ec6-9583-209885d5ff34/_release?releaseId=115&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.9.6.4552
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 8e01ba5f21033f601fdfdcbf86ca798a295c0179 Bump version to 2.9.6
  • 45e8ecffa07844f4d064dd59eb32f04d16cbf87f Fixed: Ignore special folders inside Blackhole watch folders
  • 3c4b438d2797417471be19b9d652717c88370c22 Fixed: Health warning for downloading inside root folders [ #5384 ]
  • 8fd79d729147ff99ff7b9699059c0c6636218936 New: Prefer newer Usenet releases
  • 477a799b8a15c56600a33ecd4940d140ab08195e Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 51a38bc648ed1b2d703de8fc37758e3eb4b3ac6b Fix logging message for directory watcher error
  • 917f7056952055631a35b41445d29f2ae26ac3ed Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 5a1092b5112960846f1081f5070b1ea2cc5e9f23 Prevent page crash on console.error being used with non-string values
  • ef2c6366c47d8f37639324e1daefa4e038a7db52 New: reflink support for ZFS [ #5369 ]
  • 1ffb82e3648bc3e819065f6f92ccb74562b617b7 Bump version to 2.9.5
See More * e2f8753a6a3cf8075811f78bf7424f005103125f Improve messaging for no mediums on album details * 739019498ff23e65d13b9df9ab8c706897de585a New: Add headers setting in webhook connection [ #5242 ] * 396b2ae7c10c7df749ea23ea93608b56482175a1 Bump SonarCloud azure extension for UI analysis to 3.X * 02166167386cefb37a836bee4a86ba6adaf2195d Bump SonarCloud azure extension to 3.X * 82e0b628cc808591573409f1e3a9d117ed887f37 Fixed: Parsing of release names with colon in the title * 014f8a58b19356b6beaa816e8b8adde651c82841 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 5cbb2848c79738eb2b270abf47358b43c932de4d Bump version to 2.9.4 * 554cf8ec559d86d172d762345f82ebabf5bb79ef Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 4ff6c714568e604fb1fe8952a7eaef24d23b9866 Fixed: Listening on all IPv4 Addresses * 7cfcf01ae3171eef6ef9df94092cb2a06b770cc1 Fixed: qBittorrent Ratio Limit Check * 17c5c66e549a16ede12c826c7c17a73b31c02a90 Bump version to 2.9.3 * 40dab8deb9b7ea5cd3627636ba63f42ef83cc8a2 Check if backup folder is writable on backup [ #5348 ] * 39f0e4d989c235253b01220e873c5e112616cd2f Suggest adding IP to RPC whitelist for on failed Transmission auth * 35a46eca7bb266b4d66e44062d1027e454375fc2 Bump version to 2.9.2 * 79b29f39f9f3ab457d8b42f68f0424e1071bc973 Don't send session information to Sentry * 0e19c03e9a137cb049d8a9fce25a0d72cc3f3939 Update Sentry SDK add features * e6388cab94d8e69f0a32cf5b36c863fce1f0f877 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 47e504fbc9a097ecbad9037a0e6c71c2e49b49ee Add translations for some download client settings * 1a40839202a98e9b1356bb5ea1076e149fbc7d44 Add file-count for Transmission RPC * 25a80aa29d90758fe7c3498224dc89419b95f0e1 Avoid default category on existing Transmission configurations * IPAddressRange, Polly, ImageSharp, Npgsql, System.Memory and Ical.Net [ #5333 ] * 78469a96c980fd196d3c0a0496964ecc4187a4a9 Bump MailKit to 4.8.0 and Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to 2.1.7 [ #5332 ] * bc6df548fca5b108ef59cee9598e3a91e50b61ec Automated API Docs update * 797e4c773e978176e9f979d4c8de7b78f1f6fde4 Replace URLs in translations with tokens * 119141723a776c2059eb87067c7f2f23ba2934ff Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * fd1719e58c916f93439ee069ce60831bd2a80637 Fixed: Artists without tags bypassing tags on Download Client [ #5309, #5318 ] * 8.181.1 [ #5325 ] * 198a13755faa915fe2f87825709cb0c89a016235 Upgrade TypeScript and core-js [ #5306 ] * 44a56549188566f93c539c22eebd26a5c494aac0 Log adding missing artist messages as info * entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.10.3.4602
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 81895f803387492da728a15fbfffdbb9d3b5025b Fixed: Drop downs flickering in some cases [ #5386 ]
  • a1c2bfa527111c78aef174dadb381524166ee263 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 33049910de8ed733ed915af58ab37a7829434c71 Bump version to 2.10.3
  • 6dd87fd3486c17435d028101382d93db15365095 Bump version to 2.10.2
  • 9314eb34abc75668da42f0939fa4d831e8a0bf50 Fixed: Displaying warnings for automatic failed imports in queue
  • 84b91ba6c1fda2c7ef860ee0e9be9bf5fcb6f76b Bump Polly to 8.5.2
  • 6c6f92fbed4854e7e902aee1c8f0b34e14e99100 Bump SixLabors.ImageSharp to 3.1.7
  • 1e42ae94aa77f2b29dfd85cbc8b2c3914638919f Fix Completed Download Service tests
  • 29f581086550ce5996fd56d516500cc32c13a9ce Automated API Docs update
  • 342c82aa1f523aa1e99afde0ec1e160e846fe773 Fixed: Avoid notifications on reprocessing failed items in queue
See More * 5a3f8794426834d8007ced2f4ebace4448ccadd7 Fixed: Sending import failure notifications to webhook/notifiarr * 6e57c14e57280f4544c8185cce4457d7942a6004 Fixed: Marking queued item as failed not blocking the correct Torrent Info Hash [ #4977, #4988 ] * 9fc549b43bc5076fa8e500134440ffd114c8a899 Fixed: Replace diacritics in Clean Title naming tokens * a2201001c514d07da01c63fcb88e912411a30de4 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 8c99280f07498e990a2d786e84428f34ebbc0cb7 Fixed: Adding albums with unknown items in queue * 07db508580266da2f2aaaf63dd23b649cb0aca37 Fixed: Calculating custom formats for queue * 031f32a52cfd50747abf5b161c030c6e58090478 Fixed: Refresh cache for tracked queue on artist/album add or removal * 2997c163460a4c590fbb776e5d3b7da0642475c3 Fixed: Reprocessing items that were previously blocked during importing * a1a53dbb5e017bbeb9b636aea302fd31b2df598b New: Improve UI status when downloads cannot be imported automatically * e8bb78e5bb44f3f369492124158237cd60ba0027 New: Improve messaging if release is in queue because all tracks in release were not imported * 6292f223aca1ff01fdb46270ea3fe918bb966bad Fixed: Attempt to ensure all import results are imported [ #2746, #4815 ] * f4dc294ab302051a934f1f1dc53c30844093ec58 Fixed: Instance name must contain application name * 23611cb1161c2181d36057b9c6763d87496165c0 Bump version to 2.10.1 * f177345d010cfe578f7f8eba80575d32e69b9de7 Fixed: Avoid checking for free space if other specifications fail first * ec050a7b3c6bd2ac87a915f7220eb3b89db2a169 Fixed: Prevent NullRef for webhooks when Artist Metadata is not set [ #5368 ] * 860bd04c5986013862ffea0cf10d31d72069208a New: Add artist tags to Webhook and Notifiarr events [ #4805 ] * 261f30d268d401a852f8330c46f76392ec6e24e8 New: Genres and Images for Webhooks and Notifiarr [ #4832 ] * 36998abba0a45cb709b0bcfbfcc124cb8b7de193 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * ad12617694f7ff02ceec2c31bc30b36e1dadf432 Cleanse console log messages * be115da1577ea98113e3417fe989db76b0b7824d Fixed: Fallback to Instance Name for Discord notifications * 664b97249458478f8fe1df6ea115dc3dcd158de3 Fixed: Custom Lists using only ArtistMusicBrainzId (#5399) * 2b2fd5a175b0d23bba84c5caf2dddcbd7eba7731 Fix download links for FileList when passkey contains spaces * d8222c066c04d5219a21a6e7f9f3571a67e8dcca Bump devcontainer nodejs version to 20 (#5398) * bc6417229e9da3d3cab418f92b46eec7a76168c2 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * e0e17a2ea766598e4c2f7eb70ed297f3cf9f5e86 Building docs on ARM * 5bf2ae9e6fdf91fd30f7db0eeded57e1a27b9a16 Bump version to 2.10.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Lidarr/43582661-9ac3-4ec6-9583-209885d5ff34/_release?releaseId=130&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.11.2.4629
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 3dd04cecbf6f03a1d263ce20e8da82a7a1727320 Skip spotify mapping tests
  • d8850af0193846df6de6ec38d67bfabffe58e86b Increase input sizes in edit artist modal [ #5294 ]
  • fbfd24e226ebe1c1aaca2f4d1a3d907784203e10 Bump version to 2.11.2
  • d9562c701e069650130ab8e307269cdc411f3986 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • d21ad2ad68b9e24c5b50270cdbcd06f8f8bdbf01 Automated API Docs update
  • 556f0ea54bb31227cc82253aad219f35e8a65e96 Fixed: Disallow tags creation with empty label
  • e4a36ca388e38d670bf865e5c3c59eb0d1bd57ac Log delete statements only once
  • 1045684935bb22085d3a06f7c3a23ee253d4f849 Bump Selenium.WebDriver.ChromeDriver
  • 9ba71ae6b1fec6698d7b6476768952b131b66637 Update WikiUrl type in API docs
  • 89b9352fef7ea6a5f70c9010bddef800301efa19 Fixed: Set output encoding to UTF-8 when running external processes
See More * c83332e58cfd50c95fbb2c26c946628f28f3b4da New: Prevent Remote Path Mapping local folder being set to System folder or '/' * 4677a1115a42c2e6c637e591002c9c83619b75cf Bump linux agent to ubuntu-22.04 * 6150a57596794c42b25cf50e72d1cc5c0f3ea33d Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 13f6b1a086ba95e355a9bcc37799bdcec8e5f87f Bump version to 2.11.1 * 8027ab5d2e15b128fd56227858e810f37c62c73e Include invalid path in exception message when failing to normalize * 5bdc119b980f6c13a609f35a6c337a0d4e70d09c Fixed: Include Track for history/since [ #5421 ] * 1b9b57ae9bb835d5648cf13a15ee98abc5cea528 Bump browserslist-db * c28a97cafdcb2d068cdca185ed9ceeb40027bddd Fixed: Deleting artist folder fails when files/folders aren't instantly removed * 099d19a04d9d032b943e3ef0c4082f7115c8f752 Cleanup unused sorting fields for bulk manage providers * d381463b608e3c09d8cbc77f90dd4224a18feefc New: Display indexer in download failed details * a86bd8e862ebe265efdc44fb7383834edc775e07 Fixed: Inherit indexer, size and release group for marked as failed history * 4bea38ab9c57d1dc111ce7ed6e73fcdea6669d8f Improve logging when login fails due to CryptographicException * 950c51bc5928d4b8a72b86d45249eac5be654bd1 Fixed: Priority validation for indexers and download clients * 18f13fe7f8cfec6aeab1385cd223fd67eae5bf8f Fixed: Allow tables to scroll on tablets in portrait mode * f8d4b3a59b32814fe32155999ed3ae0d5fc8756c Bump NLog, Npgsql, System.Memory and System.ValueTuple * 5cf9624e559f87245232cb676067a11bd64fd3bb Bump version to 2.11.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Lidarr/43582661-9ac3-4ec6-9583-209885d5ff34/_release?releaseId=135&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.12.4.4658
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.
